code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={name:"",email:"",photo:""};var userSlice=createSlice({name:"user",initialState:initialState,reducers:{setUserLogin:function setUserLogin(state,action){state.name=action.payload.name;state.email=action.payload.email;state.photo=action.payload.photo;},setSignOut:function setSignOut(state){state.name=null;state.email=null;state.photo=null;}}});var _userSlice$actions=userSlice.actions,setUserLogin=_userSlice$actions.setUserLogin,setSignOut=_userSlice$actions.setSignOut;export{setUserLogin,setSignOut};export var selectUserName=function selectUserName(state){return state.user.name;};export var selectUserEmail=function selectUserEmail(state){return state.user.email;};export var selectUserPhoto=function selectUserPhoto(state){return state.user.photo;};export default userSlice.reducer;
